text:
Your client: The researcher

Their end goal: To compare the length of time that students spend at school in different countries around the world. For example, they learned that in South Korea, students spend about 12 hours each day in school, by attending both a day school and a night academy. They want to compare this to how much time students spend learning (being taught by a teacher or otherwise supervised by a teacher) in your state.

Their first task for you: Help determine how much time students typically spend at school in your state.
